name: Rocks VC Userbot V01
description: Telegram Userbot To Play Audio And Video Song On VC Chat

API_ID.description: Telegram app id, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Telegram app hash, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

SESSION.description: Pyrogram session string, get it from https://replit.com/@AssadAli/String-Session-Generator

SUDOERS.description: ID of sudo users who have special access (separate multiple ids with space)

PREFIX.description: Bot commad prefix or handler (separate multiple prefix with space)

LANGUAGE.description: An available bot language (read the README.md for more info)

CUSTOM_QUALITY.description: An available stream quality (read the README.md for more info)
